eudtrg.base.mapdata.mapdata module¶

Defines global variables used throughout in eudtrg. Used internally in eudtrg.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.maprw module¶

Implements LoadMap, SaveMap function

eudtrg.base.mapdata.maprw.LoadMap(fname)¶

Load template map and read various data from it.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.maprw.PutDict_NoDup(d, key, value)¶
eudtrg.base.mapdata.maprw.SaveMap(fname, root, additionalfiles={})¶

Inject EUDObjects needed for roots into template map and save it to fname. Original map file is not altered.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.nametable module¶

Parses strings that could refer to template maps.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.nametable.ParseLocation(locstring)¶
Location name -> Location id.
  • type(locstring) is int : return as-is
  • type(locstring) in [str, bytes]: find it in template map. If matching location name -> return its location id If location name is ambigious -> raise RuntimeError If location name not found -> raise Runtimeerror
eudtrg.base.mapdata.nametable.ParseString(string)¶
String -> string id.

  • type(string) is int : return as-is.

  • type(string) in [str, bytes]: If matching string -> returns its string id. If no match -> Creates new string & returns its id.

    (May cause string overflow error.)

eudtrg.base.mapdata.nametable.ParseUnit(unitstring)¶
Unit name -> Unit ID.
  • type(unitstring) is int : return as-is
  • type(unitstring) in [str, bytes]: find it in template map / default names. If matching unit name in template map -> return is unit id If matching unit name in stock unit name -> return its unit id If unit name is ambigious -> raise RuntimeError If unit name not found -> raise RuntimeError.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.prptable module¶

Unit property table manager.

eudtrg.base.mapdata.prptable.ParseProperty(prop)¶

UnitProperty -> property id.
